DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate pharmacokinetic ( exposure trial drug body ) pharmacodynamic ( effect investigate drug body ) property FIAsp ( faster-acting insulin aspart ) geriatric young adult subject type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating Pharmacokinetic Pharmacodynamic Properties FIAsp Geriatric Younger Adult Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Male female age 1835 year ( inclusive ) ( young adult group ) equal 65 year ( geriatric group ) time sign informed consent Type 1 diabetes mellitus ( diagnose clinically ) least 12 month Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.528.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Subject donate blood plasma past month 500 mL within 3 month prior screen Smoker ( define subject smoking least one cigarette , cigar pipe daily ) Not able willing refrain smoking use nicotine substitute product inpatient period
